item.title: HowTo: Full-Encrypt data using Gentoo,Luks and initramfs
item.description: Since last post many things have changed. No more NetBSD on my laptop (this has to do with several things, I’ll write about in a future post): I had to fall in love with Gentoo! I’ll try to give you some quick overview related to this posts title: Encryption under Gentoo using Luks. There are serveral (good!) tutorials out there.
